title: NOT GETTING RP
body: I didnt get my rp im lvl 5

replies.body: Zombiemaster is spot on with the information here.  New players are new provided with a new player chest as an instruction to [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)!  Let me know if you have any questions!

The free 400 RP is no longer given to new accounts. Instead, you are given a unique hextech chest that contains Ashe and Garen champion shards, a skin shard for one of them, and enough essence to craft them.

You can read more about this [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp).
